members.member: Maximum distance between the lowest and highest surface points that can generate. NOTE: due to a bug in Godot's documentation tool, the default value shown here is not 30.0, but 200.0. This seems to be because one of the subclasses, [code]VoxelGeneratorWaves[/code], has a different default value, chosen for better practical results. This property also appears in some subclasses now, despite being defined in the base class.
Minimum height where the surface will generate.
Scale applied to the signed distance field. This is useful when smooth voxels are used, to reduce blockyness over large distances.
